channel.title: How can i run my server on my website that i bought?
channel.description:
How can i run my server on my website that i bought? I have already made a web client but i just don't know how to run the server
Help would also be appreciated [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335621.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335621.0.html[/url] and [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335298.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335298.0.html[/url] and [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;msg=2610290;topic=335622.0;sesc=4de005260510aaa9f1405d306b4bd32c]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;msg=2610290;topic=335622.0;sesc=4de005260510aaa9f1405d306b4bd32c[/url]
